name: Lang pseudo-class
description:
The **lang pseudo-class** will match the elements based on the document language. This could be set via the `lang` HTML attribute, an `HTTP` or `<meta>` information.
[info]There will be [wildcard (`*`) matching selectors](https://css4-selectors.com/selector/css4/lang-pseudo-class/ 'CSS4: Lang Pseudo Class') in CSS4.[/info]
example_description: While all elements with an English language will have a red color, the German language based text will have an blue color.
